byline.contributor: Stephanie Strom contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Efforts to combat surging rivals like Chipotle have not been as successful as the chain hoped, and quarterly earnings per share slumped 31 percent.

headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Sales Slide, as Chief Vows Changes
headline.main: McDonald’s Earnings Stumble on Sluggish Sales

snippet: Efforts to combat surging rivals like Chipotle have not been as successful as the chain hoped, and quarterly earnings per share slumped 31 percent.
abstract: McDonald's reports revenue of $5.96 billion, fall of 11 percent from quarter year earlier; new chief executive Steve Easterbook says company will institute changes to its menu as part of its efforts to respond to competition and turn around trend of several years of weak sales performance.
